analyses.title: Demographic Analysis
analyses.context: Analyzing the demographic distribution of students.

sub_analyses.title: Gender Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To understand the gender makeup of the student population.
answers: Count and percentage of students by gender.

sub_analyses.title: Race/Ethnicity Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To assess the diversity of the student population.
answers: Count and percentage of students by race/ethnicity.

sub_analyses.title: Parental Education Levels
sub_analyses.why: To study the educational background of students' families.
answers: Count and percentage of students by parental level of education.

sub_analyses.title: Lunch Type Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To determine the socio-economic indicator through lunch benefit classification.
answers: Count and percentage of students by lunch type.

analyses.title: Performance Analysis
analyses.context: Examining student performance across different subjects and demographics.

sub_analyses.title: Math Score Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To gain insights into student proficiency in mathematics.
answers: Minimum, maximum, mean, and standard deviation of math scores.

sub_analyses.title: Reading Score Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To evaluate student performance in reading.
answers: Minimum, maximum, mean, and standard deviation of reading scores.

sub_analyses.title: Writing Score Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To assess writing skills of students.
answers: Minimum, maximum, mean, and standard deviation of writing scores.

analyses.title: Correlation Analysis
analyses.context: Identifying correlations between demographic factors and performance.

sub_analyses.title: Gender vs. Performance
sub_analyses.why: To look for gender-based performance differences.
answers: Average score in math, reading, and writing by gender.

sub_analyses.title: Race/Ethnicity vs. Performance
sub_analyses.why: To explore the relationship between race/ethnicity and student achievement.
answers: Average score in math, reading, and writing by race/ethnicity.

sub_analyses.title: Parental Education vs. Performance
sub_analyses.why: To investigate the impact of parental education on student performance.
answers: Average score in math, reading, and writing by parental level of education.

sub_analyses.title: Lunch Type vs. Performance
sub_analyses.why: To determine the role of lunch type as a socio-economic indicator on performance.
answers: Average score in math, reading, and writing by lunch type.

sub_analyses.title: Test Preparation Impact
sub_analyses.why: To analyze the effectiveness of test preparation courses on student scores.
answers: Average score in math, reading, and writing by test preparation course completion.
